meanings.definition: Characterized by a style of chess play that emphasizes control of the center of the board.
meanings.sent1: The hypermodern strategy in chess focuses on dominating the center squares.
meanings.sent2: Her hypermodern approach to chess surprised her opponents.
meanings.sent3: The hypermodern chess player danced around the center like a skilled magician.
meanings.sent4: His hypermodern tactics on the board were like a masterful symphony, captivating all who watched.
meanings.sent5: The hypermodern style of chess is like a strategic dance, each move carefully planned.

meanings.definition: Extremely modern or advanced in style or design.
meanings.sent1: The hypermodern smartphone had features beyond imagination.
meanings.sent2: Their hypermodern house was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: In the hypermodern world, even the simplest gadgets seem like magic.
meanings.sent4: The hypermodern architecture of the building stood out like a beacon in the city.
meanings.sent5: She embraced the hypermodern fashion trends, always ahead of the curve.
